text:
Britain is woefully under-prepared for the Coronavirus war that is now exploding.  
Not enough tests, not enough PPE, not enough ventilators. 
People now dying in large numbers as a consequence & Govt. ministers are being shockingly disingenuous about this shameful incompetence.
